text: The Communauté de communes Coteaux et Châteaux was a group of communes in the Hérault departement and Languedoc-Roussillon region of France. It was created on December 31, 1997, by decision of the Prefecture,Présentation Générale de Coteaux et Châteaux (official website) and dissolved on January 1, 2013 upon merging with surrounding communauté de communes to form the Communauté des communes des Avant-Monts du Centre Hérault. ==Etymology== The name comes from the local coteaux (vineyards) and chateaux (castles), prominent features of the countryside. ==Communes== Coteaux et Chateaux contained the following communes:Les communes de Coteaux et Châteaux (official web) * Fos * Gabian * Margon * Montesquieu * Neffiès * Pouzolles * Roujan * Vailhan ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * Look up coteau and château on the Wiktionary. *
title: Communauté de communes Coteaux et Châteaux
